This is an absolute must-play for any gamer looking for story and puzzle-solving. Portal 2 takes everything its predecessor did well, and continues to build on that, making a better, richer, more immersive experience. I was blown away from the very first cinematic. I love the meta-story elements that make the player feel like they are almost breaking out of the gameâ€™s intended world. Portal 2 introduces its mechanics to the player progressively through creative puzzles, then incrementally increases the difficulty through combining those learned mechanics. Amazing art direction and design, which remain consistent within the world it creates. Plus a whole separately tailored campaign for multiplayer couch co-op! If I had to critique on one thing, there is no explicit way for the player to receive help within the game, small hints are given, albeit intrinsically, for puzzle solutions. Personally I prefer this as part and parcel of the challenge, however some players might become stuck and unable to progress.
